root.name: Caveman Games
root.description: Released for the NES in 1990, Caveman Games was a compilation of six mini games based around cavemen and Olympic style events. Included in the game are: Clubbing (fighting), Dino race, Dino vault (pole vault), Fire start, Mate toss (hammer throw) and Saber race. All of the events are played one vs one, and are played primarily by rapidly tapping one button.

similar_games.game: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games
